name: Zenzero
description: With a wealth of experience in providing professional IT products, services and support to small and medium sized businesses, Zenzero are ideally placed to offer the IT advice your business needs to succeed. Our partnerships with market-leaders such as Microsoft and Dell as well as a number of cloud and security providers enable Zenzero to tailor our support to suit your exact requirements.

locations.address: Innovation Centre, Warwick Technology Park, Gallows Hill
